post_detail.title: Denny's Facebook App
post_detail.description:
My Contribution:

As a back-end developer for the project, I created the web-services using Zend Framework and Instagram's API to pull tagged photos from Instagram servers and store them in our mySQL database so that they could be moderated by the brand.

Execution:

We designed the Facebook app as a 30 day photo contest that took advantage of CFM's experience with the Instagram API. Each day a new hashtag, based off Denny's and various food themes (#blueberries, #pancakes, #butter), was used for photo entries. Users were encouraged to submit their photos with the hashtag of the day via Instagram, or to upload them directly to the site. Each day a winning photo was selected, and that user received a $10 Denny's gift card.
